column.Name: CustomField1
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM iCustom1 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: StyleType
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleTypeID, StyleTypeDescription FROM pStyleType ORDER BY StyleTypeOrder

column.Name: WorkflowType
column.lookupquery: SELECT WorkflowTemplateID, TemplateName FROM pWorkflowTemplate WHERE Active = 1 AND Body = 0 ORDER BY TemplateName

column.Name: CustomField2
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomSort FROM iCustom2 Where CustomSort = 3 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: WashType
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM iCustom14 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: StyleSet
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, CustomKey FROM xCustom9 ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: CustomField3
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM aCustom3 Where CustomSort1 = 7 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: StyleCategory
column.lookupquery: SELECT StyleCategoryId, StyleCategory FROM pStyleCategory WHERE StyleCategorySort = '07' ORDER BY StyleCategory

column.Name: CustomField4
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM aCustom12 Where CustomRelationId = ##ID## ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: SizeRange
column.lookupquery: SELECT SizeRangeCode, CustomH FROM pSizeRange Where CustomH = 1 ORDER BY SizeRangeCode

column.Name: SizeClass
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom AS CustomName FROM pSizeClass ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField10
column.lookupquery: SELECT AttributeName FROM pLinePlanStyleAttributeType1 ORDER BY AttributeName

column.Name: CustomField20
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM xCustom72 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField9
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM xCustom29 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField13
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM pActive ORDER BY Custom

column.Name: CustomField12
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom, Custom1 FROM xCustom26 Where Custom1 = 1 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: CustomField11
column.lookupquery: SELECT Custom FROM xCustom28 ORDER BY CustomKey

column.Name: Designer
column.lookupquery: SELECT Firstname +' ' +Lastname as name, Firstname +' ' + Lastname as fullname from users Where TradePartner = 0 order by firstname
